name: Hypergalaxy Squad
description:
"Hyper Galaxy Squad" is a Sci-fi turn-based tactical game.SUMMARY
"Hyper Galaxy Squad" is a Sci-fi turn-based tactical game.
You can recruit and customize your own landing squad members. They will board the target spacecraft to perform the mission.

The turn-based combat was inspired by the XCOM series.
Random star maps will bring more uncertainty to your journey.

The game has several stages.
Each stage will have a key mission, finish it and you can move on to the next stage.
Until you complete the final mission.

SQUAD

You can recruit and customize your squad members.
Up to 6 landing players or 3 mechs can be deployed in a single battle.
Each team member's armor, weapons, items and skills can be customized.
In general, if a squad member is seriously injured or killed during mission, you will lose this member forever.
You can recruit more players at any time through the recruitment points in the galaxy.


Soldiers have grades and specializations. They are:

  • NEW RECRUIT
    A recruit without any skills.
    Recruits can use a carbine and a shotgun.

  • ASSAULT GUNNER
    Common arms in landing combat.
    In addition to carbines and shotguns, assault gunners can also use melee weapons such as laser swords to deals multiple damage to enemies in one turn.

  • SNIPER
    The snipers have farther sight and better precision.
    Snipers can use sniper rifles. High-level snipers can react to all moving targets.


  • HEAVY GUNNER
    The heavy gunner has a strong firepower and blasting ability.
    Heavy gunners can equip heavy machine guns, which can cause a lot of damage to large targets and bunkers..

Some weapons:
COMBAT MECH
Apart from the basic combat units.
You can also operate combat armor.
Mechs are not cheap.
The mech is equipped with a main weapon and multiple secondary weapons. Heavy weapons can cause more damage.
Its armor is a nightmare for the enemy.

The mechs are big and will occupy the slots of two team members.


BACKGROUND
In the 24th century, with the application of FTL technology, the human colony spread throughout the galaxy.
The antimatter fuel required for interstellar travel is extremely rare.
With enough antimatter fuel, you can control the commercial trade of entire galaxy.
The warlords of each solar system are fighting for the capture of antimatter minerals.
In the end , two large corporations were formed, and they opposed each other, Empire that believes in absolute power
and Galaxy Republic that believes in freedom and equality.
The war between the two major corporations lasted for decades.

You accepted the request of the Galaxy Republic to perform a dangerous mission.

You will organize your own landing combat squad and go deep into the enemy until you complete the mission.
